name: InvasivePneumococcalDiseaseTestsForStreptococcusPneumoniaeByCultureAndIdentificationMethod
title: Invasive Pneumococcal Disease (Tests for Streptococcus pneumoniae by Culture and Identification Method)
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with Streptococcus pneumoniae in culture),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: VSAC query: Streptococcus pneumoniae culture/isolate;  

LOINC search:  'Streptococcus pneumoniae (culture or isolate)'),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
